column4: I have a setup with XP, OSX, an ubntu/various flavors of linux boxes. What would be best for file sharing? Samba?
<devnull>: Yeah, the only thing I dislike is the strange number of errors and dropped packets
<devnull>: Like playing music can be pretty jumpy over the wireless lan
I have had great success with SMB in the past - I'm stumped on it at this moment, though, so I can't wholeheartedly recommend it. :/
